reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: Empowering women with disabilities in Central Asia. WHAT: The project supports networking of women with disabilities in five Central Asian countries: Kazakhstan, Kirgizstan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan.WHY: Network gives possibility for peer su pport and helps women to exchange information and materials. A questionnaire was conducted for the project partners and it revealed that disabled women don't receive enough information about reproductive and sexual health and rights.HOW: With the help of t he network the information about the rights is efficiently spread for the disabled women and peer support raises self-esteem. The project benefits the local disabled women who gain experience and information. The Finnish Family Federation provides training on sexual education.PARTNER ORGANISATION: The project is implemented by the Kazakhstan Organization for Disabled Women Shyrak.
